meanings.definition: A unit of computer memory or data storage equal to 1,048,576 bytes.
meanings.sent1: My computer has a 1 megabyte storage capacity.
meanings.sent2: I need to download a file that is 5 megabytes in size.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally deleted a megabyte of important documents!
meanings.sent4: Her brain processed information at the speed of a megabyte.
meanings.sent5: The megabyte of data was lost in the digital sea of information.
